name: Sumo (itch) (LucianoStudios)
description:
Sumo is a 1v1 Multiplayer Game in which the objective is to be the last player remaining on a floating platform through any means necessary. Discover new mechanics and strategies in this high skill cap game. 

Play with your friends online or together on a single device. Complete challenges to unlock rewards. Win ranked matches to appear on the Leaderboard!

New additions and features are currently being worked on!
